definitions.title: n.pr.terr.
definitions.body: Ararat (As. Urarṭu COT:Gloss, cf. Lag:Armen. Stud. § 100)—´[[א]] Je 51:27; [[אֲרָרָָט]] Ge 8:4 + 3 t.—a district in Eastern Armenia between the river Araxes & lakes Van & Oroomiah, cf. KGF; to this prob. ref. in 2Ki 19:37 = Is 37:38 ´[[אֶרֶץ א]]; also Ge 8:4 ´[[הָרֵי א]], where the ark rested; used perhaps with wider ref. Je 51:27 ´[[מַמְלְכוֹת א]] (‖[[מִנִּי]], [[אַשְׁכְּנַז]]).
